string.text: Get the artefact
Protect the Stalkers camp at the Garbage from the bandit assault
Protect the Stalkers camp at the Garbage from the bandit assault

A group of Stalkers are coming to visit me, and I am personally interested in their safe arrival. They'll stay not far from the Bar. One penitent criminal element almost voluntarily informed us that they are going to be attacked soon. So... head in that direction and protect their camp from the assault
Help Stalkers fight off the Bandits at Agroprom
Help Stalkers fight off the Bandits at Agroprom

So here's the deal. Recently a group of stalkers went to Agroprom. The last time they contacted, they said that there was something valuable in the underground, but they were pressed hard by the bandits. They're holding on, but they can't clear out. Will you help them out?
Eliminate the bandits at the Garbage
Wipe out the bandit gang that settled at the Garbage. It has to be a quick and efficient operation

A job, eh? Let's see what we've got... Aha! Here you go: can you knock out that pack of bandits at the Garbage? Duty, with all their speeches about law and order, just can't get around to it. Those are some rare scumbags, so they won't last long anyway. But the guy who gets them first will score big... and the booze is on me, of course
Eliminate the Mercs and bandits in Wild Territory
Destroy the group of Mercs and bandits that block the passage through Wild Territory

There's a gang of Mercs not far away, in Wild Territory. They hit it off with the bandits, so now they're scheming to block the passage through the plant. I don't need to tell you what a nuisance it is, it's got to be resolved straight away. The Duty guys and some of the old-timers have already gone to teach them a lesson, but we haven't heard from them in a while... So why don't you... eh... go and check on them? The money's good, too
Eliminate the Mercs at the farmstead
It's very simple - clear the farmstead of Mercs

There's the farmstead by the old Warehouses. Used to be a perfect place for a rendezvous, to exchange goods, you know... that sort of thing. But now the Mercs have occupied it and, by the looks of it, they are not about to leave. Now, that doesn't suit me at all. I need this farmstead asap. I don't care what happens to the lodgers
Purge the bandit camp in Wild Territory
Purge the bandit camp in Wild Territory
There are bandits in the Wild Territory. We can't let these dregs of society breed like rats right near the bar. It's essential to wipe out their camp
Destroy the dog lair in the Wild Territory
Destroy the lair of wild mutant dogs in the Wild Territory

A few of our guys went on an expedition, came back alone. All torn up, bloody, glassy eyes. Ran into dogs, most likely. There's a whole pack of them there. So, find their lair and kill every last one of them
Destroy the group of bandits at the Agroprom
Destroy the group of bandits at the Agroprom

I remember how in '94 the racketeers latched on to me - cough it up, they said. Man, I went through hell then, I had a restaurant and all. Back then there was no case against them! And here I find out that the same gang's working in the Agroprom, making a profit off of the artefacts they find there. But from here I can do nothing. I even know exactly where they're hiding. Do me a favor, and punish them...
Destroy the lair of Snorks in the Dark Valley
Destroy the lair of Snorks in the Dark Valley

Yeah...It seems that the ones who say that the zone is expanding are right. They spotted a few Snorks in the Dark Valley, but before they never saw them there. And here some started to panic. The Dutiers promised to destroy the Snorks, but they can't seem to get around to doing it. Will you take it on?
Find a Meat Chunk artefact
Find a Meat Chunk artefact that heals ailments and injuries

Some padres have stopped by, left an order for a Meat Chunk. You know, they have a certain interest in this healing artefact... those rotten miracle-workers! Anyway... You gonna do it? It's up to you...
Find a Crystal Thorn artefact
Find a Crystal Thorn artefact that protects against Psi-attacks

A 'Corn Thistle'? No, that's not it. 'Thorny Crystal'? No, wrong again... Bugger! 'Crystal Thorn', that's it! So here's the deal: I have an order for this artefact, a 'Crystal Thorn'. Have you heard of it? They say that if you've got one, no creature will be able to mess with your brain. So what do you say?
Find a Night Star artefact
Find a Night Star artefact to help the National Military Research effort

I need a Night Star artefact. I'm sorry to say it doesn't grant any wishes, been there, done that, but it can make you wealthy. Scientists pay a lot for it. They say they make some military things out of it... So, are you up for it?
Find a Flash artefact
Find a Flash artefact
The assignment is simple and the pay is good. You have to find a Flash artefact. Don't even ask who ordered it and why. Well, will you do it?
Find a Goldfish artefact
Find a Goldfish artefact

Marked One, you know the fairytale about the Goldfish? Yeah, yeah, that's the one. There are a bunch of jokes about it too. So anyway, there's this old man who keeps on wanting to catch it. Bottom line, I need the one-of-a-kind artefact called Goldfish, the client is from the outside, respectable. Will you help out?
Find psi-suit
Find the suit that gives efficient protection against Psi-emissions. The place to look for it is the deserted labs in the Dark Valley

In those labs in the Dark Valley, they were trying to find a way to protect human brains from psi-emissions. They were taking their time, that's for sure... Anyway, one of their attempts actually was a success, and there's supposed to be this suit somewhere that you can wear and even kiss the controller. Yep, it's that good. So if you get me this suit, I'll never forget it
Find gun for the foreigner
An interesting assignment. The name rings a bell... but where do I know him from?

There once was this foreigner in our neck of the woods... Gordon was his name? His whole manner gave out an experienced stalker, but he said he'd never been to the Zone. But anyway, that's not the point. He did vanish somewhere in the Zone eventually. But he had this rather curious thing, the Black Kite. If I could just take a closer look at it...
Find the modified Vintar
Find the modified Vintar. Apparently, the place to look is the Red Forest area

There was this odd story. This one fellow pops up, pockets full of dough, and sets off hiring himself a gang, not the old-timers though, but more of the nippy type. Bought tons of gear... I had this one brand new Vintar, a marvellous gun! - so I was fool enough to sell it to him. I won't lie to you, I made quite a bit of money... except this whole crew got knocked out close to the Red Forest. What can I say, they died for nothing... well, a good lesson for all to learn: you can't pave your way through the Zone with money. But anyway... I can't stop thinking about that Vintar, such a bang-up gun rusting somewhere! Won't you find it for me? I'm paying good money!
Kill the soldier
A soldier has to bite the dust. The job is a piece of cake, except... it's weird that the target's a man in uniform, and the customer really has his dander up
I need you to take down this grunt... Don't ask me who he is, what do I care! Just do it. So, can I entrust you with it?
Kill the loner
Do in one of the loners. Death to the cheater, that's the trader's revenge

You know, there's this type of man that you could never say a bad word about... you trust him as you trust yourself, right? You bank on him... But suddenly you find out that he is the vilest and meanest son of a bitch... So here's the deal: there's this one case that needs to get sorted. Do it, and I'll take care of the rest
Kill the loner who became a Monolithian
Find traders ex-friend and help him die

I used to have a friend... hard to believe, eh? Ah! we came to the Zone together when none of this stuff was here... The things we used to do, the places we used to go to... oh well, we were young, didn't give a damn about anything... But he could never get enough. He wanted to go to the center of the Zone and was talking me into it, but I refused, and did the right thing... We had a really bad row, and he left on his own... And now I hear someone saw him there... he's with Monolith now. So the deal is, Marked One... As a friend, do this for me, find him and... well, don't make him suffer, it must be bad enough... He was like a brother to me, you know?
Kill the loner called Vampire
Find and kill the loner called Vampire

That's it, I've had enough of this scum-bag! I mean Vampire; do you know him? That bastard! Sucking luck out of people instead of blood. Whoever goes with him, they all die, all to a man, but he always comes back safe and sound! Done it five times now! That's evil, don't you think? I'd love to put some garlic on this Vampire's grave... So, do you take the job?
Kill the loner called Sparrow
Find Sparrow and avenge the death of another loner

Damn musketeers! Playing D'Artagnan, assholes! As if surfing around anomalies and bowing to bullets is not enough, the oafs have now taken to fighting duels! Get this: there was this row... no one can even remember any more what started it. So these two dumb-heads decided to shed some blood. And there you go, one dropped dead... a fine loner he was, too! And the other one, Sparrow, beetled off, because I'd be the first one to put a bullet in his head. Find him. I'm sure he's still in the Zone. Will you do it?
Obtain the Flesh Eye
Obtain the Flesh Eye

Soon we're having a party, there'll be a fancy dinner, and certain local gourmets who are in especially high spirits (we don't need to point fingers) will definitely want to try my special recipe - Flesh eyes in a pork sauce. That is, marinated in its own juices under a mayonnaise topping. Basically, I need the eye of that beast, and quickly...
Bring the hoof of a Boar
Bring the hoof of a Boar

You know that we procure the horns and hooves? It is now very rare. From local mutated hooves make nice jewellery, I know a jeweller, he is interested. So forward, find a Boar's hoof, and your pocket money will arrive
Bring a Feral Cat's tail
Bring a Feral Cat's tail

There is in sight, there is... With the 'Big Land' received an application on the tail of the local cats. From an artist friend, he came to visit us once, 'to write a place full of decadent charm.' We did, of course with the territory is not allowed, but that was painted notable. So, he argues that from the wool of these cats get a very good pile of trusses. Of course, I understand, is a dangerous business, alone, these creatures do not run hither, but... money is money. Yes, and you're like no greenhorn. Well, Spot, would you take for it?
Find a Tushkano head
Find a Tushkano head

Work, you say? I have a lesson for you, Spot. One of my friends, the local busy, as there he called it... 'Underground spirits'. He has a prescription compound, but the quality of end product - my compliments. So, he constantly needs Tushkano Heads, extracts it from their brains, Ha-ha-ha-ha, which opened his eyes? But the fusel oils and other rubbish in his home brew less than half that in the 'Cossacks"! But do not worry so reward for the extraction of Vodka do not you ladies. Well, respecting the old man?
Protect the security post of the Duty
Protect the security post of the Duty at the Garbage

So, you probably ran into our guys at the Garbage. They're there as a sort of an exterior post protecting the bar from mutants coming down from the Dark Valley. Information has come in that a sick herd of Boar is approaching them. Help them fight off the mutants, and I'll owe you one
Destroy the zombie
Destroy the zombies at Yantar

Recently we sent a group to Yantar. Unfortunately, nobody from the group returned. I was informed that they saw a few zombied stalkers from the group not far from the mobile lab of the scientists at Yantar. We can't allow them to remain in that horrible state. Your assignment: find and destroy that, which they've become
Get rid of the pack of dogs
Get rid of the pack of dogs at the Garbage

We, naturally, don't give assignments to foreign stalkers. On the other hand, this is a simple task, so there's no point making our guys do it. So listen. You need to purge a small lair of beasts at the Garbage. One of our groups is already working there, so in case of trouble you'll have a place to retreat to. On the other hand, there shouldn't be any problems because there aren't many beasts there - not more than ten. Most likely dogs: recently there were reports of a migration of a large pack of them in the area. You can get paid well for carrying out the assignment
Destroy the neutrals camp
Destroy the neutrals camp at the Agroprom

There's one delicate matter, but our guys definitely shouldn't be involved in. The presence of neutrals in the factory at Agroprom isn't advantageous for our allies. Here's the assignment: free the area from the presence of the neutrals, no matter who they are and what group they belong to. Understood?
Destroy the detachment of Mercs
Destroy the detachment of Mercs in Rostok

So here's the assignment: you need to destroy a detachment of Merc snipers. The situation: these snipers are holding the last floor of the building site complex. Assumed amount: not less than two, nor more than five. They're armed, judging by everything, with sniper rifles. Suggestion: don't show your face there during the day
Protect the bandit base
Protect the bandits' main base in the Dark Valley

It is imperative to raid the bandits' main base and destroy the maximum amount of strength of the enemy. That's in the Dark Valley, where there's an unfinished science center. The enemy is numbering about thirty fighters; armed with light automatic weapons, guns, shotguns. Everything clear?
Eliminate the Snorks
Eliminate the Snorks in the tunnels in the Yantar sector
This time you'll get to do some purging. The tunnels at Yantar are simply breaking from all the Snorks: there's around ten of them there. Yeah, now you can't weather the storm there as before...
Destroy the herd of fleshes
Destroy the herd of fleshes at the Wild Territory

We tracked the migration of a large herd of beasts...Quite disgusting swine-like mutants whom everyone calls Fleshes. Now they're in the area of the Garbage. All of our people are busy, but these beasts need to be destroyed. It's a special kind of job - we'll pay
Destroy the Pseudodogs
Purge the lair of Pseudodogs by the Military Warehouses

Our allies have notified us about the discovery of a lair of monsters in the territory by the Military Warehouses. We believe it's a pack of Pseudodogs. We shouldn't be messing around in that area right now, so it's an assignment for a neutral. Are you in?
Destroy the security post of the Mercs
Destroy the security post of the Mercs not far from the Military Warehouses

Lately there's been an increase in the activity of groups of Mercs, there's been a few attacks on the scientists, researchers working in the Zone. We can't leave that unpunished. We need to carry out a small punitive operation. The goal: the security post of the Mercs by the Military Warehouses, behind the abandoned village
Destroy the Mercs in the Wild Territory
Destroy the Mercs in the Wild Territory
A group of scientists is planning to study the Wild Territory. But lately it hasn't been safe there, the Mercs have gotten activated. Make sure that there aren't any more Mercs in the Wild Territory
Kill the bandits
Kill the bandits who got into the Wild Territory
I'll make this short. The bandits got around our security posts at the Bar and are now located in the Wild Territory. They need to be eliminated
Destroy the controller
Destroy the controller at Yantar

To carry out this assignment you need to have special skills. The scientists have reported to us that they noticed a controller at Yantar, by the entrance to the underground lab (in the center building). Controllers are very dangerous, but I'm sure you'll manage
Purge the Freedomers
Purge the abandoned village not far from the Military Warehouses from the Freedomers

There's been an increase in the activity of the Freedom patrols in the abandoned village by the Military Warehouses. Purge the village from fighters. After carrying out this assignment a special reward awaits you
Destroy the bandits
Destroy the bandits at the Garbage

The current situation is unfavorable, the bandits are gathering in the areas of the Garbage and the Dark Valley. The best solution is to carry out two pre-emptive strikes at the same time! Our fighters will take on the valley, and you'll get the Garbage
Find the enhanced rifle
Find the enhanced LR-300 near the Military Warehouses

Someone helps the Mercs. Quite recently they got equipped with machine-guns, enhanced for sniper fire. You understand that it's a dangerous toy? Well, I'm interested in such a gun. My gratitude will be pertinent, be sure
Neutralize the bandit
Neutralize the bandit Poker

Nickname object: Poker. One of the most violent leaders of the bandits, scoundrel and rapist... His head is clearly not in order: There is talk in the Zone for some rare disease earned. Now he has a pretty frequent complete loss of memory, but when it comes to himself, does not remember where he is and who. Nevertheless, always armed and very aggressive. Estimated Location: Dark Valley. Ready for the task?
Get a poltergeist eye
Get a poltergeist eye

Smirnov, Spot! Saluting! What you say? Already passed the guard on duty at the entrance? And even got a ticket? Well, joker... Okay, to business. In general, the 'great land' was urgently needed eye 'poltergeist'. Preferably, intact. I know, Spot, that you're an experienced stalker, seen a lot, so I think that with such a task you could do. Reward worthy. Well, if you do not want, tell me immediately. Forcing will not
Get a zombie hand
Get a zombie hand

Ease... Assignments, you say? There is a job, and just on your part. Met in the zone zombies? No, not those with weapons, and those who hand waving. What? Oh, no, no breaks! (Mumbles under his breath) And how do you do about the breaks you know them in the Zone for six months, as no. Oh, well. Look, how this creature looks like. I have it all to what... Job or appeared. The good, the money. We need, therefore, we hand it is from such a handsome man. Well, liking a little adventure?
Find the Dutyer's lost weapon
The Dutyer is asking you to find his weapon, he lost it somewhere in the Dead City during another scouting expedition

Shouldn't have freaked out like that. How the zone messes with your head. Thought I had good nerves, never afraid of anything, and here this. This howling in the ears. Everything was going as usual. There was a scouting expedition to the Dark Valley, we got down into the trench with Krivoi to cover the rest of the group, and then once I heard the howling, I was gripped by fear. Damn, I don't even remember how I got to the coordinate. When I returned to the base, Voronin almost shot me on the spot: he had just given me an enhanced cannon, for good service, so to speak. And here...I panicked and took off so fast that I left the cannon there. Could you bring it back for me, else where will I go now without a decent weapon
Purge the lair of the Snorks
Destroy the lair of the Snorks at Yantar

I want to offer you a small amount of money that you'll receive if the Snorks living in the swamps will stop bothering me and my colleagues. Sometimes when we're carrying out our experiments, we can't even concentrate
Destroy the lair of wild dogs
Purge the lair or wild dogs in the Wild Territory

There's a mutant-dogs' lair at the Wild Territory, I want you to travel there and clear it up. These mutants are particularly dangerous for our expeditions. I now that zoologists won't favor this, but this is not a zoo here, I must admit. Such beasts spread rabies, plague or hell knows what else
Bring a Fireball artefact
Bring a Fireball artefact to the scientists for research

We've managed to obtain the artefact in laboratory condition! This is a breakthrough! Now all the world will hear about our success. And the Nobel Prize will be close at hand! This is the unique artefact - 'Pellicle', its main quality is to protect from the chemical burns. Do you want me to give it to you on behalf of science? However, I do have one request - in return I need the artefact 'Fireball', do you know about such? Unique thermal qualities of its surface require thorough research
Find a Gravi artefact
Bring a Gravi artefact to the hands of the scientists

We've approached closely to the comprehension of the nature of gravitation, practically, soon enough we'll be able to create a new generation of engines on the anti-gravity basis, and quite probably the path to the stars will open to us. For that, we need a 'Gravi' artefact, and fast
Find a Medusa artefact
The scientists need the Medusa artefact to carry out research in the field of space-time

Our research team is on the brink of discovering the mystery surrounding the Space-Time Continuum. The possibility of Teleportation is no longer a fantasy! The Vortex is an anomaly which squeezes space rather than just gravitationally affecting objects, as believe some of my ossified opponents-theorists, who sit in the warm research facility earnestly chewing chalk. Their glasses will fog when they find out what results science can achieve when you work in the field! Please get me the 'Medusa' artefact
Find a Moonlight artefact
Provide a Moonlight for the scientists at Yantar. A good artefact...

We desperately need materials for continuing our research in the field of energetics. You see, we learned to generate energy with the help of artefacts. Granted, this works while the KPD isn't high enough. We were able to get the best results with the artefact Moonlight. Please bring us a sample for experiments
Find an Urchin artefact
The scientists need an Urchin artefact to improve their suits

You are probably aware of the fact that our suits provide the best defence against radiation. The secret lies in the fact that we saturate them with a lotion made out of quite a rare artefact. To manufacture another series of these suits we need such an artefact. You'll know it as an 'Urchin'
Bring the unique bodysuit
Bring out of the underground laboratory X16 the unusual suit

We have some business with you. Recently we hired a stalker to get into the laboratory. Even then I noticed his unusual bodysuit - it gave off noticeable heat. The stalker said that the bodysuit itself can heal wounds. Bottom line - the stalker didn't return from the lab. Oh no - don't even think it! We had nothing to do with it! And his bodysuit is most likely still there. I would be very glad to get it for research
Obtain part of a Snork
It's a piece of cake getting a fragment of a snork in these parts

We got acquainted with Semenov back in the university where I was giving lectures on genetics, and he was my student. Thus I became his scientific chief. Back then, we were only slightly unveiling the curtain of mystery of genome modification. So what was I saying? Oh, right. For genetic experiments we will need the samples of fresh cells of the muscular tissue of snork. You will have to search the bogs for this genetic material. There is a hypothesis that Snorks as species are the new level of humans evolution. In order to know this for sure, DNA tests must be procured!
Find an eye of a Flesh
I'd better keep my body away from these eggheads just in case! Very well, I'll get them a flesh's eye, and they can do all they want with their volunteers

Good news, young man: we have a very interesting assignment for you! I think as an intellectual being with quite a bit of experience you will be able to appreciate my colleagues' theories. The thing is, our research revealed: the eyes of the creatures called flesh in the common language, are equipped with... are you following me?... with olfactory receptors! Thus, they cannot only see with their eyes, but smell with them as well! We're getting ready for an operation on transplanting this miraculous eye to one of... one of our voluntary assistants. I believe we're about to start a craze! By the way, would you like to become a recipient of this rather amazing organ?
Bring the leg of a Boar
Gourmet thrill seekers... Alright, I'll get them some ham

Welcome, eh... traveller! I'm so glad you dropped by: we are in need of a man to take part in a highly important experiment. My colleague Brenter wants to try and cook a meal using local fauna for a practical experiment to study the influence of mutated protein on human body. For a start, we decided to try the Boars. We need ham. A Boar's leg, do you understand? And if you agree to do it, please select the healthiest specimen
Bring a tail of a Pseudodog
Well, look at Science! Trying to find a second brain in humans?... Poor dogs, one of them will have to do without a tail now

Good day, colleague! I hope you know that dogs belong to the vertebrates subtype... meaning their vertebral column starts with the head and ends with the tail. And here's the catch! One of my young colleagues proved theoretically that the spine of the pseudo dogs - this is how you named this type of animals - starts from the tail, not from the head! Think of it, it totally turns upside down our assumptions pertaining to this area of knowledge. There are already some rather daring theories about human beings having around their sacrum a... well, this is a subject of many discussions. In short, we need the head of the dog, the pseudo dog, which through ignorance we considered to be its tail
Bring a bloodsucker jaw
What they are going to do with bloodsucker's jaw, I don't care. I care about how much they will give me for this rarity

Oh, stalker, glad to see you! Listen... You've already encountered bloodsuckers in your travels? If not, then we would like to make it happen. As soon as you can, bring us the lower jaw of one - and all, so to speak, cutlery. Unfortunately, I cannot let you in on the details of the experiment... maybe this will negatively affect the stability of your psyche. We'll wait and see...
Get a hand controller
Environmentalists want a controller hand, they do not accidentally want to also learn how to manage beings?

Ekhm... Labelled? I think in your travels you come across one very curious creature, called 'controller"? Us, you see, are very interested in some of his abilities... If you provide us with the necessary material for research, a hand, for example, we will be very grateful...
Camp elimination
Find the item
Protect the stalkers at Army Warehouses
Fight off the Mercs' attack of the stalkers' camp at Army Warehouses

There's a group of stalkers, they live at the Army Warehouses. Average guys, they understand that the Zone is a place of freedom, that laws don't apply here and you just have to live right, based on your own morals. And now they're thinking about maybe joining us. Yeah, help them fight off the Mercs? And we'll send you some ammo
Protect the border
Protect the border near the army warehouses from monsters
Here come the monsters again from the side of the Scorcher. Help the guys at the border hold them off. I guarantee a reward
Destroy the military camp
Destroy the military camp by the Agroprom Research Institute

The military are staging a gradual Zone takeover. We need to slow them down, otherwise the Zone will turn into a research zoo. One of the military camps is right by the Agroprom. If you manage to purge the place a bit, it will slow down Zone's takeover by the army
Destroy the Merc camp
Destroy the Merc camp by the warehouses

Listen, here's the deal. The Merc camp needs to be destroyed. We could leave them be, they're good shots... except they've been really asking for it, sneaking into our territory, trying to bribe my people. It's time to teach them a lesson. Can you do it?
Destroy the Duty detachment
Destroy the clean-up Duty faction in Rostok

How 'bout going on a hunt? Duty's clean-up detachment showed up at Rostok. This is a great chance to take them by surprise. Duty keeps sending guys hunting for the monsters, but in the process they don't hesitate to shoot whoever isn't up to their liking. This detachment needs to be finished off before Duty comes to Rostok. There shouldn't be too many people: three or four veterans and a couple of rookies
Destroy the Duty outpost
Destroy the Duty outpost at the Garbage as soon as possible

There's a very urgent job. The passage from the Garbage to the Bar needs to be cleared of the Duty unit... They've taken to hiding there and robbing the passers-by. We're expecting a very important package, but now it must not be ruled out that Duty already knows about our courier and will try to waylay him. We need to wipe out this roadblock, even if for a little while. Okay?
Clear the village
Clear the village of bloodsuckers and, if possible eliminate the controller

Man, will you look at all those bloodsucking monsters swarming in the village! No one gets within a hundred meters of it, except complete dumb-heads. And some say they've been seeing things there... a controller is all we need right now! Anyway, it's high time we put an end to it. I'm not forcing you, to tell you the truth I wouldn't go there myself. But if you're not afraid, then my gratitude won't have any bounds
Destroy the herd of Boars and fleshes
Destroy the herd of Boars and fleshes by the Military Warehouses

Our sniper sits at the entrance to the base. He sits there in the tower at night...it's quiet, night-time...and suddenly there's an explosion, wild screeching, a flash! What the!...It turns out, Boars and fleshes got into the habit of wandering around by the minefield. The devil knows what makes them go there, but sure enough at least once every week one of those beasts gets torn up by a mine. The assignment is simple - kill all of those suckers off. Will you do it?
Destroy the herd of rodents
Destroy the herd of rodents in the Wild Territory

There are no rodents anywhere near our base, those these creatures can get anywhere. And just recently there were so many of them here - you wouldn't believe it. Two months we dealt with them...he he he. So, we figured out where the rodents came from to our base. From the Wild Territory, you follow? There's a fear that these jumping rats will multiply and return. We need a man to take care of them for us. Will you go?
Steal the sniper rifle
Steal the modified SVD from the Duty warehouse

There is a special assignment. And pretty tough, too... So, you'll need to retrieve an improved Dragunov from the Duty Warehouse. This piece even has a name of its own, but never mind. The main thing is that with its awesome scope and recoil canceller you can shoot a squirrel in the eye from 400 meters. So, I trust you'll do it!
Obtain the modified Chaser 13
Obtain the modified Chaser 13 from the scientists

I hear the eggheads managed to improve the Chaser shotgun by using an artefact. The knock-down power of this thing is the same as a Howitzer. So why don't you pay them a visit and see if you can make a bargain. I'll make up for all expenses!
Bring the bulletproof vest
Bring the new model of the bulletproof vest

Some of the grunts are sporting a new type of bulletproof vests. The inside lining is soaked in some healing ointment or something like that... anyway, it makes small wounds heal up very fast. And imagine what luck: just the other day ten of those guys ran into Yantar, and only six returned, with three on their shoulders. You follow? One of them got left behind. If you get us his bulletproof vest, we'll examine it and make us a lot of them too
Kill the Duty Security Chief
Kill Duty's Security Chief and try do it as quietly as possible

It would be well for Duty's security chief to quietly disappear. And when they're in a deep mess, I'll be able to plant a few of my guys in their gang. And then, the devil can pull off any stunt... alright, I better shut up. I suggest you take care of him from a distance, without kicking up a fuss
Kill Captain Ivantsov
Kill Captain Ivantsov, the closest aide of the Duty leader

It's a tough job, I'm warning you right away, but it's worth it. Ivantsov, a close aide of the Duty leader, has been asking for it. He does the dirtiest jobs: punitive operations, raids... If you only knew how many of our guys he's killed off! It's high time we did away with this slime-ball. So if you make up your mind to do it, I suggest you get yourself well armed
Kill Colonel Petrenko
Kill Colonel Petrenko, one of the founders of the Duty faction

Colonel Petrenko... I don't know if you've heard the name or met him, but it would be good for the two of you to meet. This man is one of the Duty founders and one of our worst enemies. Try to make sure your conversation ends as fast as possible... for him. Can you handle that?
Destroy the neutral stalker
Find and destroy the neutral stalker
There's a fellow who's walking around not far from here. He shot one of ours down once. And something like that can't be forgiven. Will you take the job? We'll pay, don't worry
Kill one of the Duty commanders
Kill one of the Duty commanders
I'll pay for the head of any Duty leader! Knock one off and come back for reward
Kill the stalker called Scarecrow
Eliminate the stalker called Scarecrow

We eliminate monsters, except for us it's a matter of survival, not profit. Mutant populations are not as numerous; besides, they're living beings too, so we can't permit their annihilation. Some individuals refuse to understand it. An apt illustration is the stalker called Scarecrow. He got his nickname for a reason, selling stuffed mutants. We've warned him before, but all for nothing. So can you do a good deed for mother Earth?
Kill the stalker called Barin
Kill the stalker called Barin, chief quartermaster of the Duty faction

A cad, boot-licker, hypocrite and coward... that's stalker Barin for you. As you can see, a man with a marvellous character, which helped him get to the top of Duty. Currently supplies the faction with supplies and foodstuff, though he takes part in raids from time to time. We need to get rid of him, especially since all the clues regarding Duty logistics lead to Barin
Obtain the leg of a Boar
Obtain the leg of a Boar
We got dinner planned in honor of the birthday of Bob Marley. You, brother, get us a Boar's leg tastiest, eh? Or better two! Jah will never forget you!.
Bring claw of chimeras
Bring claw of chimeras

Oh! Friend poor fellow, stalker sinner! Spot, psycho, the son of a whore! And we're just about you it led. So that I say: 'mark - a grip that from living chimeras claw inflicts!' And these two dunce do not believe me, can you imagine? They say: 'Let the dead at least a tear.' See what they are suspicious? I'll suggest that's what: you're my claw, and I'll - swag sack. Weighty. So, get me a claw?
Destroy the lair of the bloodsucker
The hunter is asking to purge the lair of the bloodsucker in the village near the Military Warehouses, and in return he promises a rare artefact

Have you ever run into a bloodsucker? Horrible thing, isn't it? Well the other day I went to the village by the Military Warehouses, thought I'd look for some artefacts. And imagine this: suddenly I see a bloodsucker, black, and with scars all over. He's sitting over the corpse, doesn't see me. I freaked out and made a run for it. I shouldn't have started running though, because he heard me and went after me, and there was all this growling all around me and then I realised that he wasn't alone. I think they have a lair there. If you could chase them away from there, I would give you a rare artefact that I found a couple days ago
Kill the traitor
Kill the traitor
Baldy wants you to kill a traitor who took off with a very rare artefact

A while ago another stalker and I went looking for an artefact right next to the scorcher. We found so much stuff, even found a couple of artefacts that I'd never seen before, not even pictures of them. So that son of a bitch tricked me. During the last night he snuck off and hid the most valuable artefacts. And then tried to tell me that they disappeared on their own. A couple days ago I saw one of those very rare artefacts at the Bar. I was so pissed... Anyway, stalker, if you could find him, send him a lead greeting from me. And while you're at it, maybe you can find out where his secret stash is and get the second artefact. It's worth it, believe me
Kill master stalker
The Merc should pay for the culling of each Master Stalker. The fewer Masters there are, the easier it is for the Mercs

We're concerned about walking dreadnoughts wandering the Zone. Stalkers in Exoskeletons armed to the teeth. The work becomes even more dangerous and harder for us, and they get all the best pickings. The fewer of them there are - the better it is for us. Kill one of them - and receive a reward
Obtain a mutant body part
Destroy the stalker from Freedom
One stalker, a former dutyer, who had a lot of important information about objects at Pripyat, recently came over to the Freedom side. He needs to be silenced before he says too much

Listen here. We have maps of Pripyat - not up-to-date ones, but old ones, made in the early 90's. The most important thing on them is the marking of all military objects: underground warehouses, bomb shelters. Now there's little use from it, of course, but if we find a road to Pripyat, this information will become priceless. Here's the problem though. One of the officers went over to the Freedom side, and he knew about this information. Bottom line, he needs to be silenced before he says too much
Come back for the reward
Bring the customer what's been promised
Find the perfected suit
Nimble told us about the stash of the bandits where they hid the Habar. He's asking to bring back the stolen suit, for a reward, of course

While I was in captivity, I heard the bandits talking about their secret stash, where they keep the Habar. Heard that they hid a cool coat there, and the next day some monster got his eye on the stash. And he became so interested in it that now they're afraid to go there. Do me a favor, bring me the suit, and I'll pay you well
I can't offer anything at the moment
And what do you want to talk about?
Great job, award well deserved!
What's up?
Look what we've got now:
Cover the Duty detachment in the Dark Valley
Cover the Duty detachment from the attack of the bandits in the Dark Valley

I finally managed to get it into the thick heads of the dutyers that it's high time to purge the Garbage from bandits. The Duty will get to enlarge its territory and they won't damage my regular clients as often. Well, here's the deal - the leadership of the Duty decided, for starters, to cut off the flow of bandits from the Dark Valley. So they sent out a blockade detachment and discovered that the bandits didn't like that. Who would have thought! So what I'm wondering is, could you help them secure the entrance to the Valley? I'll thank you handsomely
There are no jobs available right now
What do you want to discuss?
Good boy! Job well done
I'm listening
Here's the job update:
For the moment there's nothing
What assignment do you want to talk about?
Assignment is complete - and here is the reward!
And what about the assignment?
There is something:
Sorry, but we don't have any jobs at the moment
What is the job you would like to talk about?
You did a great job! Allow me to present you with your reward
I'm listening
Here's what I can offer:
Destroy the bandit camp at the Garbage
Eliminate the bandits at the Garbage who rob stalkers on the way back from the Zone. The trader will be happy

The bandits have rallied lately, getting in the way of honest people trading... So make a beeline for the Garbage, I've been told these scum-bags have settled down near the scrapyard. You look into this matter, and everyone will be grateful to you, and I'll be generous with the reward. Agreed?
Destroy the bandit camp at the Auto Park
Eliminate the bandits at the Auto park. Apparently, they're new to the Zone, so the job is gonna be easy

The bandits have been hanging around the Auto Park again. So did you guess already what the job is about? Well then... jump to it! Pass our warmest greetings to them and come back, I'll thank you then. Deal?
Eliminate the bandits by the Agroprom Research Institute
Eliminate the bandits by the Agroprom Research Institute. Better stay on friendly terms with the trader
Some bandits turned up by the Agroprom Research Institute. They're disturbing my diggers when they sort through the rubbish. You solve the problem, I'll owe you
Purge the area from mutants
Purge the area from mutants

There is one thing, pretty easy. They want to bring some foreign tourist over. He paid some dough to my homies to get to look at the zone. And the area where they're gonna show him around needs to be cleared of mutants. Will you do it?
Eliminate two bandits at the Garbage
Make the road to one of the best places in the Zone accessible to all

Recently one of the best places in the Zone became inaccessible for lovers of the wonderful. At the Garbage...yeah, the Garbage, there's a quaint little place like nothing else, where all your sadness leaves you, where you forget about the dirt, about money, about blood. Forgot, that is, because now there are two dirty freaks sitting there, who threaten to kill anyone who doesn't pay them for being able to enter the place. Get rid of them - I have no other place to take the tourists
Kill the bloodsucker in the Dark Valley
Kill the bloodsucker in the Dark Valley

They say that the troops left the Dark Valley. And then monsters started pouring out of every crevice. The stalkers already spotted a bloodsucker there, and an extraordinary one at that - he's not afraid of open spaces. Any way, once word gets around to the scientist, they'll definitely want to study this bloodsucker. And I want to be the person who hands them over the body. Your job is to kill the bloodsucker, and I'll take care of the rest
Find a Medusa artefact
Find a Medusa artefact formed in the SpringBoard anomaly
Some guy from outside of the Zone has asked me to find him a 'Medusa' artefact. It's not a lot of money for you, but it should be a relatively easy task. Are you in?!
Find a Stone Flower artefact
Find a Stone Flower artefact that's formed in the Springboard anomaly. The pay is supposed to be pretty good

I have a request for a Stone Flower. The order is from the jewellers, by the way, so let's try to make the pretty ladies happy, eh? If you get it, you'll get the money and a bottle to drink to their health...
Find a Night Star artefact
Find a Night Star, a rare and expensive artefact

There is this one little job... rather unpleasant. Apparently, it's coming from the military, they're working on some new protection. Anyway, there's an order for the Night Star. It's quite a rare artefact, but it provides pretty good protection from bullets... So will you do it? I'll pay you well!
Find a Meat Chunk artefact
Find the wound-healing artefact called Meat Chunk
There's an order for an artefact, the kind that heals wounds, called Meat Chunk! They have a clinic of some sort. If you get it you'll get paid and help people at the same time
Find the perfected pistol
Obtain the gun called Fort that has, rumor has it, a larger amount of cartridges in its magazine. Its last known owner was the commander of the military checkpoint under the broken down bridge

Man, now there's a fad about using rigged weapons and nobody wants to shoot from normal weapons anymore, not even the newbies! Anyway, there's an order for an improved machine gun. Rumor has it the commander of the soldiers, the one who collects money for passing under the bridge, has a 'Fort' with a fat cartridge clip. Will you get it?
There's no job right now, really...
So what is it that you want to discuss?
Here's a fine young man! Excellent job, here's your money
What's up?
Here's what I've got:
For the moment there's nothing
What assignment do you want to talk about?
Assignment is complete - and here is the reward!
And what about the assignment?
There is something:
It's alright. Some other time
I've done the job
I refuse to do this job
Kill the bandit leader
Kill the bandit leader who crossed the trader. Most likely he won't be alone... Tough job, but the pay covers it all. The Garbage is the place to look for him

You'll have to finish off this one dandy, one of the bandit leaders. The other day the bandits, by his order, intercepted my courier and shook him up and I don't waste words with those who touch my people... In a word, if you get it done, I'll return the favor. So are you up for it?
Kill the trader stalker
Kill a stalker... Well, that's not the best job, lifting a hand against a fellow worker. But the pay is pretty good, and this may be what matters the most

I'm having a confrontation with this one trader. Well, if he doesn't want to cooperate, the hell with him! But I won't let anyone start filthy rumors. In short, he needs to be wasted so the others don't get out of hand. He and a few henchmen were last seen near the church heading northeast. Let them all know who's the boss here...
Kill the rookie stalker
Finish off a rookie stalker, who may not be a rookie at all... Then who is he? Ah, who cares! As long as the job's not messy
There's this one guy here loafing about, pretending to be a rookie, but he's rather weird... So anyway, if he suddenly disappears, you'll be doing me a great favor. You know what I mean?
Kill the stalker called Fiend
Eliminate one of the trader Sidorovich's rivals, a stalker called Fiend

The Fiend, aka Oleg Gusarov... used to serve in Spetsnaz. As long as he minded his own business, I had nothing against him, a loner is a loner. But I hear he's mustering a gang to crush down Cordon and take control over smuggling operations from the Zone. Now this is a major problem and it has to be solved quick. So will you do it?
Kill Father Diodor
To kill a man preaching in the Zone against gathering and selling artefacts? Exactly

I always said business and religion can't go together, they can never cross, and should never ever meddle in the other's affairs! It's just this padre, Lord forgive me, Diodor... well... he just can't see this simple truth. He keeps raving about artefact hunting, says that trading in them drives people to sin not just in the Zone, but in the whole world, on and on along those lines. Get this, he preaches the destruction of artefacts altogether! See what he is up to? The worst bit is that he's actually got some converts! I've tried to approach this Diodor this way and other, but he just keeps at it. Here's the deal: you're going to send him upstairs where he can preach all he likes... you get the point, right? And I'll give you a cool artefact. So, we've got a deal?
Kill the sales representative
Kill the 'sales representative'. The trader is looking after his reputation

Imagine this: there's some weirdo running around here who introduces himself as my sales representative, uses my reputation, and then tries to hand off second-rate stuff! Broken barrels, the armor that's falling apart, expired canned goods. I've already had to deal with a few unhappy clients. Bottom line, I need a man to have a little chat with that 'sales representative', whatever it takes
For the moment there's nothing
What assignment do you want to talk about?
Assignment is complete - and here is the reward!
And what about the assignment?
There is something:
Nothing for the current moment
What task do you want to talk about?
Task complete... and here's the reward!
So what's with the task?
There is something:
Bring the jaw of a Bloodsucker
So the tentacles of the Bloodsucker bring good luck? It's going to be an unlucky Bloodsucker...

I heard a superstition that the jaw of a Bloodsucker brings you good luck. As if the one who wears that tooth around his neck gets past the anomalies, and artefacts fall right into his hands. Anyway, it's all bullshit, but there are some dopes who believe it all and are ready to pay well for it. If you bring me a bloodsucker jaw, I'll pay you well
Bring over the tail of a Pseudodog
Bring over the tail of a Pseudodog

Winter soon. And what in the winter there, on continent, women like to carry? Correct! To carry furs they love. Here the fashion new also has gone, accessories of Pseudodog tails! Wool there what that especial! More shortly, there is an order for such a tail. You will undertake?
Find a hand of the Pseudogiant
Find a hand of the Pseudogiant

Task is also difficult. It is hard work. You are ready, you speak? In general, one defensive enterprise has made the order for a hand of the Pseudogiant. What you speak? A foot? And, lines it will disassemble that this such! In general what it goes. The enterprise serious, pays very well. But consider, - the Pseudogiant - the creature is extremely dangerous. I already sent two - have hardly crawled back. And you the stalker serious, know the possibilities. What do you say?
Find a Burer hand
Find a Burer hand

So, Marked One... In trophies from the Zone, power structures friendly and not so friendly strongly are interested. One came to me recently: in a suit, with a diplomat, dry as a stick. Also speaks somehow miraculously... 'Is', - speaks, - 'organism strongly interesting a part of Burer. Very to wish it to receive.' Opens a suitcase, and there green that at the fool of candy wrappers. To You 'greens' to what, I know, but for me will not rust. I will present, so to say, swag and 'loot', he-he...
For the moment there's nothing
Which assignment do you want to talk about?
Assignment is complete - and here is the reward!
And what about the assignment?
There is something:
I'm here for the job
I'm not interested in those kind of jobs
Some other time
I'm up for it
What will I receive for it?
I need a job. Do you have something for me?
For the moment there's nothing
Which assignment do you want to talk about?
Assignment is complete - and here is the reward!
And what about the assignment?
There is something:
There's no job right now
What job do you want to talk about?
Job's done... and here's the reward!
What about the job?
Here's something:
For the moment there's nothing
Which assignment do you want to talk about?
Assignment is complete - and here is the reward!
And what about the assignment?
There is something:
For the moment there's nothing
Which assignment do you want to talk about?
Assignment is complete - and here is the reward!
And what about the assignment?
There is something:
Destroy the Boar lair
The Boars made a lair next to the place where Wolf and his friend made a storage. Wolf asks to purge the lair, and promised to handsomely reward you

My friend and I had a storage here not far from the car park, where the forest is more dense. Basically, just what you need. But recently the Boars made a lair there, and now we can't get to the storage. Help - kill the Boars, and I'll thank you, for myself and for my friend
Destroy the mutants at the farm
Wolf asks to purge the farm from mutants, wants to set up an outpost camp there

Though this is the border of the Zone, newbies have it tough even here. The bandits are only half the problem - they at least understand Russian. But the mutants - it's really tough with them. They made themselves a lair at the abandoned farm, took over the only good place for an outpost camp. If you manage to purge the farm from the mutants, I'll owe you
Purge the dog lair
There's a pack of dogs by the South checkpoint at the Bar. The head of the checkpoint asks to purge their lair. Promises to reward
Despite our efforts, some monsters still manage to break through from the Garbage. Well you yourself probably saw a pack of dogs to the south of us. If you kill them you'll get a reward
Camp defence

I need to find some items for flame-thrower repair:
1. Fireball artefact
2. Tubes. I need to ask Sidorovich about them.
3. Manometer. It should be in the central complex in Agroprom.
4. Burner. I need to ask Barman about it.
5. And, of course, 10 bottles of vodka for this freak...
It's gonna be a hard day...
Find a Fire Dummy artefact
Find a Fire Dummy artefact for Zahar

Marked One, to us here scientists have ordered one rare enough artefact: Fire Dummy. Will find it not simply so if bring it, I will thank normally, except for miscellaneous junk I will give to you so, the information in one our hiding place, stuff there some we store
Find a Skin artefact
Find a Skin artefact for Zahar

Marked One, again to us here scientists have ordered an artefact, but, truth, now an artefact Skin. Conditions former: you will find the necessary artefact, you will receive some stuff, well and so, I will throw off on your PDA the information on one hiding place
Find a Mother's Beads artefact
Find a Mother's Beads artefact for Zahar

Again, Marked One, scientists on a neck have sat down, here and now it is artefact 'Mother's Beads'! And where it to take? You will find - I will return the favor, an award corresponding! Yes, nearly has not forgotten, from me Marked One, cost for itself just in case, but, to you these things it is more necessary
Find an Electric Porcupine artefact
Find an Electric Porcupine artefact for Zahar

Both, Marked One! In time, just, business to you is. The order for one artefact, Sakharov lately absolutely - demands only the best, and good artefacts simply on road do not roll. In general, it is necessary to find artefact 'Electric Porcupine'. You will bring - you will not regret, I will begin to cry generously, besides, here one of ours has disappeared recently, and so, I will share the information about his hiding place. It is all the same not so necessary to it
At present there is nothing
About what task you want to talk?
Task is executed... take payment!
What about it?
There is something...
